'''1.99''' was an update for [[PlayStation 4 Edition]] released on December 10, 2019, alongside [[Bedrock Edition 1.14.0]]<ref name="release">{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360037105792|title=Minecraft - Buzzy Bees - 1.14.0 (Bedrock)|date=December 10, 2019}}</ref>. It is accessible through the ''Editions'' button in ''Minecraft for PlayStation 4''.

==Changes==

*Added "Launch new Minecraft" to the title screen.
*Added "What's new Minecraft" to the options screen.
